/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. A river meanders through the center of the street, reflecting the buildings and the clear blue sky above. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the earthy tones of the buildings.
